# abbreviationDictionary

**Type Property**

Returns the mapping of abbreviations to time zone identifiers.

## Declaration

```swift
static var abbreviationDictionary: [String : String] { get set }
```

## Creating a Time Zone

- **init(secondsFromGMT:)**: Returns a time zone initialized with a specific number of seconds from GMT.
- **knownTimeZoneIdentifiers**: Returns an array of strings listing the identifier of all the time zones known to the system.
